price: Walio kufuru watakuwa na adhabu kali; na walio amini na wakatenda mema watapata msamaha na ujira mkubwa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ
footnotes: Wanao mkufuru Mwenyezi Mungu na Mitume wake watapata adhabu kali. Na wanao muamini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mitume wake, na wakatenda mema watapewa kutokana na Mwenyezi Mungu kusamehewa madhambi yao, na ujira mkubwa kwa vitendo vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
